text: Brose Baskets Bamberg (also Brose Baskets) is a basketball club in Bamberg, Germany. In 2005 (as GHP Bamberg), 2007, 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013 it won the BBL. In 1992, 2010, 2011, and 2012 it won the German Cup. Category:Bamberg Category:Basketball teams Category:Sport in Bavaria Category:Sports organizations of Germany
title: Brose Baskets
